mapper.select: SELECT a.FS_ID as fsUnitId , a.FS_VAL as fsValue , a.FS_NM_ENG as fsUnitNameEng , a.FS_NM as fsUnitName , a.FS_DTL as description , a.FS_TP_ID as fsTypeId , (SELECT b.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD b where a.FS_TP_ID=b.CD_ID) as fsTypeName , a.BS_UNT_ID as bsUnitIdId , (SELECT b.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD b where a.BS_UNT_ID=b.CD_ID) as bsUnitName , a.BS_UNT_VAL as bsUnitVal , a.FS_UNT_VAL as fsUnitVal , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.REG_DT as regDt , a.UDP_DT as udpDt FROM TB_FS_UNIT a WHERE a.USE_YN='Y' AND a.FS_TP_ID=#{fsTypeId}

SELECT a.FS_ID as fsUnitId , a.FS_VAL as fsValue , a.FS_NM_ENG as fsUnitNameEng , a.FS_NM as fsUnitName , a.FS_DTL as description , a.FS_TP_ID as fsTypeId , (SELECT b.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD b where a.FS_TP_ID=b.CD_ID) as fsTypeName , a.BS_UNT_ID as bsUnitIdId , (SELECT b.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD b where a.BS_UNT_ID=b.CD_ID) as bsUnitName , a.BS_UNT_VAL as bsUnitVal , a.FS_UNT_VAL as fsUnitVal , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.REG_DT as regDt , a.UDP_DT as udpDt FROM TB_FS_UNIT a WHERE a.USE_YN='Y' AND a.FS_TP_ID=#{fsTypeId} AND a.FS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fsTypeName},'%')
